mapper.select: SELECT B.ISBN, B.TITLE, B.COVER, B.AUTHOR, B.PUBLISHER, B.PUBDATE, B.STATUS, S.REVIEW_DATE, S.STAR FROM BOOK B INNER JOIN SCORE S ON B.ISBN = S.ISBN ORDER BY (SELECT AVG(STAR) FROM SCORE WHERE ISBN = B.ISBN) DESC FETCH FIRST 10 ROWS ONLY

SELECT ISBN, TITLE, COVER, AUTHOR, PUBLISHER, PUBDATE, DESCRIPTION, STATUS, CATEGORY_NAME, CATEGORY_ID FROM ( SELECT ROW_NUMBER() OVER(ORDER BY TITLE DESC) AS RN, ISBN, TITLE, COVER, AUTHOR, PUBLISHER, PUBDATE, DESCRIPTION, STATUS, CATEGORY_NAME, CATEGORY_ID FROM BOOK WHERE ( AUTHOR LIKE '%' || #{query} || '%' OR TITLE LIKE '%' || #{query} || '%' OR PUBLISHER LIKE '%' || #{query} || '%' ) ) WHERE RN BETWEEN 1 AND 10

SELECT NT_NO, NT_TITLE, NT_CONTENT, NT_DATE FROM ( SELECT ROW_NUMBER() OVER(ORDER BY NT_TITLE) AS RN, NT_NO, NT_TITLE, NT_CONTENT, NT_DATE FROM NOTICE WHERE( NT_TITLE LIKE '%' || #{query} || '%' OR NT_CONTENT LIKE '%' || #{query} || '%' ) ) WHERE RN BETWEEN 1 AND 10

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT F.FAC_NO, F.FAC_NAME, F.FAC_CONTENT, A.FAC_ATTACH_NO, A.FAC_PATH, A.FAC_ORIGINAL_FILENAME, A.FAC_FILESYSTEM_NAME, A.FAC_HAS_THUMBNAIL, ROW_NUMBER() OVER (ORDER BY F.FAC_NO DESC) AS RN FROM FACILITY F INNER JOIN ATTACH_FAC A ON F.FAC_NO = A.FAC_NO WHERE F.FAC_NAME LIKE '%' || #{query} || '%' ) WHERE RN BETWEEN 1 AND 10
